intro: Serinia cespitosa, commonly known as the desert broom, is a flowering plant native to arid and semi-arid regions of Africa and the Middle East. It is a shrub characterized by its dense,丛生 (clump-forming) growth habit and small, narrow leaves. The plant produces yellow flowers in clusters, which bloom during the warmer months.
